page.title: 18Wetwang,Leisure
page.content: Lots of people like to go for walks in the lanes around the village and if they have a dog they like to take that too. There is a cricket club and a bowls club and they each have their own pitches.Some people play golf on the cricket field and some people exercise their dogs there. For people who don't fancy their hand at bowls or cricket there is always the pub.The pubs have darts and dominoes teams. For old age pensioners there is the Darby and Joan club which meets in the village hall every two weeks and they go on outings. Some adults help at the play group and they enjoy that. Sometimes there is something on at the village hall like whist and you can go to that.
